_sText:
////////////////////////////////
// Weapon Roulette Spawner By //
// HellRaisedSurfer           //
////////////////////////////////

Please feel free to use this as
long as you credit me.

also feel free to modificate it.

for further help or explanation
Read "IMPORTANT" text which
comes with the prefrab, for
details or contact details.

FACTS:
216 outputs
16 Func_wall_toggles'
9 game_player_equips


you can get 8 different weapons
from this spawner

1: GLOCK
2: USP
3: DEAGLE
4: TMP
5: M4A1
6: SCOUT
7: AK47
8: AWP

12.5% chance for each weapon:)

VIDEO:
<object width="500" height="405"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/2OYReQ7JffM&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b&border=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/2OYReQ7JffM&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b&border=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="500" height="405"></embed></object>


probably further development later.

/HELLRAISEDSURFER
